transcript: I even had a a tiny trampoline next to my desk cuz sometimes I would have too many back toback appointments and so I didn't have time to do my whole my whole routine I'd be like next person come in I'd be on my trampoline and I'd be like hey welcome United Fitness how's it going today I have found out that you can't be in a bad mood with the trampoline have you tried it you can't do it you can just been broken up with found out you got fired you're on a trampoline having a good day so you want to hop on they're like no I'm good I like all fine all right so what brings you today that's it
